overview: A policeman's wife becomes a drug addict and goes to work at the dreaded "Club Lesbo;" an affiliation run by gangsters. A haunted devil mask also figures into the, er, um, plot.
tagline: Come with me and see... Wildest Parties Ever! Sights to stimulate and satisfy all tastes, at the club of forbidden desires... Club Lesbo!
title: Spiked Heels and Black Nylons
